patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,18 +1,17 @@
 import React from 'react';
 import styled from 'styled-components';
 import { AppColors } from '../../../styles/colors';
 import { AppTextStyles } from '../../../styles/textStyles';
+import CMSLayout from '../../../components/CMSLayout';
 import BranchManagement from './BranchManagement';
 import PositionTable from './PositionTable';
 import RoleTable from './RoleTable';
 import EmploymentTypeTable from './EmploymentTypeTable';
 import PermissionTable from './PermissionTable';
 
 const Container = styled.div`
-  padding: 24px;
-  min-height: calc(100vh - 140px);
-  background-color: ${AppColors.background};
+  width: 100%;
 `;
 
 const Header = styled.div`
   margin-bottom: 32px;
@@ -66,61 +65,63 @@
 `;
 
 const SettingsPage: React.FC = () => {
   return (
-    <Container>
-      <Header>
-        <Title>시스템 설정</Title>
-        <Subtitle>기본 데이터 및 조직 구조를 관리합니다</Subtitle>
-      </Header>
+    <CMSLayout currentPath="/cms/settings/staff-permission">
+      <Container>
+        <Header>
+          <Title>시스템 설정</Title>
+          <Subtitle>기본 데이터 및 조직 구조를 관리합니다</Subtitle>
+        </Header>
 
-      <TablesGrid>
-        {/* 지점 등록 - 수정 가능 */}
-        <TableSection>
-          <SectionTitle>
-            지점 등록
-            <StatusBadge $editable>편집 가능</StatusBadge>
-          </SectionTitle>
-          <BranchManagement />
-        </TableSection>
+        <TablesGrid>
+          {/* 지점 등록 - 수정 가능 */}
+          <TableSection>
+            <SectionTitle>
+              지점 등록
+              <StatusBadge $editable>편집 가능</StatusBadge>
+            </SectionTitle>
+            <BranchManagement />
+          </TableSection>
 
-        {/* 직급 - 고정 */}
-        <TableSection>
-          <SectionTitle>
-            직급
-            <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
-          </SectionTitle>
-          <PositionTable />
-        </TableSection>
+          {/* 직급 - 고정 */}
+          <TableSection>
+            <SectionTitle>
+              직급
+              <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
+            </SectionTitle>
+            <PositionTable />
+          </TableSection>
 
-        {/* 직책 - 고정 */}
-        <TableSection>
-          <SectionTitle>
-            직책
-            <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
-          </SectionTitle>
-          <RoleTable />
-        </TableSection>
+          {/* 직책 - 고정 */}
+          <TableSection>
+            <SectionTitle>
+              직책
+              <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
+            </SectionTitle>
+            <RoleTable />
+          </TableSection>
 
-        {/* 고용형태 - 고정 */}
-        <TableSection>
-          <SectionTitle>
-            고용형태
-            <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
-          </SectionTitle>
-          <EmploymentTypeTable />
-        </TableSection>
+          {/* 고용형태 - 고정 */}
+          <TableSection>
+            <SectionTitle>
+              고용형태
+              <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
+            </SectionTitle>
+            <EmploymentTypeTable />
+          </TableSection>
 
-        {/* 권한 - 고정 */}
-        <TableSection>
-          <SectionTitle>
-            권한
-            <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
-          </SectionTitle>
-          <PermissionTable />
-        </TableSection>
-      </TablesGrid>
-    </Container>
+          {/* 권한 - 고정 */}
+          <TableSection>
+            <SectionTitle>
+              권한
+              <StatusBadge>고정 데이터</StatusBadge>
+            </SectionTitle>
+            <PermissionTable />
+          </TableSection>
+        </TablesGrid>
+      </Container>
+    </CMSLayout>
   );
 };
 
 export default SettingsPage;
